member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateMemberAccountRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the AssociateMemberAccount operation. Associates a specified AWS account with Amazon Macie Classic as a member account.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateMemberAccountRequest.MemberAccountId
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MemberAccountId.
The ID of the AWS account that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic as a member account.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateMemberAccountResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the AssociateMemberAccount operation.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateS3ResourcesRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the AssociateS3Resources operation. Associates specified S3 resources with Amazon Macie Classic for monitoring and data classification. If memberAccountId isn't specified, the action associates specified S3 resources with Macie Classic for the current Macie Classic administrator account. If memberAccountId is specified, the action associates specified S3 resources with Macie Classic for the specified member account.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateS3ResourcesRequest.MemberAccountId
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MemberAccountId.
The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you want to associate with Macie Classic.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateS3ResourcesRequest.S3Resources
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property S3Resources.
The S3 resources that you want to associate with Amazon Macie Classic for monitoring and data classification.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateS3ResourcesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the AssociateS3Resources operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.AssociateS3ResourcesResponse.FailedS3Resources
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property FailedS3Resources.
S3 resources that couldn't be associated with Amazon Macie Classic. An error code and an error message are provided for each failed item.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.ClassificationType
member.summary: The classification type that Amazon Macie Classic applies to the associated S3 resources.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.ClassificationType.Continuous
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Continuous.
A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie Classic.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.ClassificationType.OneTime
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property OneTime.
A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a specified S3 bucket.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.ClassificationTypeUpdate
member.summary: The classification type that Amazon Macie Classic applies to the associated S3 resources. At least one of the classification types (oneTime or continuous) must be specified.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.ClassificationTypeUpdate.Continuous
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property Continuous.
A continuous classification of the objects that are added to a specified S3 bucket. Amazon Macie Classic begins performing continuous classification after a bucket is successfully associated with Macie Classic.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.ClassificationTypeUpdate.OneTime
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property OneTime.
A one-time classification of all of the existing objects in a specified S3 bucket.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateMemberAccountRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DisassociateMemberAccount operation. Removes the specified member account from Amazon Macie Classic.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateMemberAccountRequest.MemberAccountId
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MemberAccountId.
The ID of the member account that you want to remove from Amazon Macie Classic.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateMemberAccountResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DisassociateMemberAccount operation.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateS3ResourcesRequest
member.summary: Container for the parameters to the DisassociateS3Resources operation. Removes specified S3 resources from being monitored by Amazon Macie Classic. If memberAccountId isn't specified, the action removes specified S3 resources from Macie Classic for the current Macie Classic administrator account. If memberAccountId is specified, the action removes specified S3 resources from Macie Classic for the specified member account.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateS3ResourcesRequest.AssociatedS3Resources
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property AssociatedS3Resources.
The S3 resources (buckets or prefixes) that you want to remove from being monitored and classified by Amazon Macie Classic.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateS3ResourcesRequest.MemberAccountId
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property MemberAccountId.
The ID of the Amazon Macie Classic member account whose resources you want to remove from being monitored by Macie Classic.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse
member.summary: This is the response object from the DisassociateS3Resources operation.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.DisassociateS3ResourcesResponse.FailedS3Resources
member.summary:
Gets and sets the property FailedS3Resources.
S3 resources that couldn't be removed from being monitored and classified by Amazon Macie Classic. An error code and an error message are provided for each failed item.

member.summary:

The error message of a failed item.

member.name: P:Amazon.Macie.Model.FailedS3Resource.FailedItem
member.summary:

The failed S3 resources.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.AmazonMacieClient
member.summary:
Implementation for accessing Macie
Amazon Macie Classic
Amazon Macie Classic is a security service that uses machine learning to automatically discover, classify, and protect sensitive data in AWS. Macie Classic recognizes sensitive data such as personally identifiable information (PII) or intellectual property, and provides you with dashboards and alerts that give visibility into how this data is being accessed or moved. For more information, see the Amazon Macie Classic User Guide.

member.name: T:Amazon.Macie.IAmazonMacie
member.summary:
Interface for accessing Macie
Amazon Macie Classic
Amazon Macie Classic is a security service that uses machine learning to automatically discover, classify, and protect sensitive data in AWS. Macie Classic recognizes sensitive data such as personally identifiable information (PII) or intellectual property, and provides you with dashboards and alerts that give visibility into how this data is being accessed or moved. For more information, see the Amazon Macie Classic User Guide.
